name: Mirror Mage (Sunstorm93)
description:
Dungeon Crawling Teleporter!

Control the Explorer, entering the many stages of the tower for the treasure that lies at it's peak! Of course They didn't go alone- use your reflections to teleport and pick up things that are in dangerous areas!

- Warp and Clone your way across many stages as you climb the tower to reach the summit and find the treasure.

- Difficulty Slider for those that want to take it easy with auto recovery or have a challenging dungeon crawl with faster and stronger enemies.

- Keep your wits about you- just about everything in this tower is out to kill the explorer, and the tower itself offers many puzzles that require good mirror usage! 

- Collect Gems or try to beat your friend's time in a race to the top! Can you beat the game without taking damage?
